name: Afterworld DELUXE
description:
THEY 2 YEAR LONG PROGECT COMES TO A CLOSE

Explore 5 Different worlds with over 15 different enimies!

For buying the game, you will recive

  • a .ftm file of the games music to be used in Famitracker
  • 3 Desktop Backgrounds
  • Soundtrack Alblum + Arranged Soundtrack
  • A 20 Minuite discord call (Check the "Read Me Before Using" text document in the files for details.)

Physical Editions will be coming soon!
